lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world!

lender.name: Raymond Chiu
lender.loan_because: i care.
lender.occupational_info: life insurance salesman

lender.name: Muching
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Clinton Foundation HIV/AIDS Initiative, where I work on building capacity in the health systems of developing countries

lender.name: Tony Dawson
lender.loan_because: A small loan can add value to products and quality to lives.
lender.occupational_info: I grow certified organic Ambrosia apples.

lender.name: Preeti
lender.loan_because: I\'m just amazed by the buzz surrounding microlending. It\'s a wonderful idea and its results are impressive. I just wanted to join in and be part of it all.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides free legal services to indigent parents involved with the child welfare system.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that people will succeed when given a chance. I loan because I care.
lender.occupational_info: I make stories to entertain, raise questions and have fun.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea. I run the parent association at my child\'s school and we gave each class money to donate to Kiva.It is wonderful to get the children involved and teach them how to make a difference.

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.loan_because: I can and should

lender.name: Mason & Michelle
lender.loan_because: This was something that we chose to do in lieu of wedding favors. We wanted to find a way to help people.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Micro loans seem to work far better than large internationally financed loans.
lender.occupational_info: A mix of business, art, travel.

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: It's a no brainer way to make a huge difference in people's lives and developing communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with web sites to either help create them or improve them.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: ....it is my sense that one of the most powerful gifts we are provided in this life is the gift of creation. We create sand castles, we create new technologies, we create families…we often even create perfect screw-ups. Loaning to motivated people all over the globe provides each of us an individualized opportunity to allow others to create new lives for themselves while they in turn make a huge difference in their local communities. By providing others the chance to create they create new situations that ultimately will benefit others – countless entrepreneurs, countless possibilities – all of this enabled by microfinance…sounds like a good reason to loan.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I am amazed by fellow entrepreneurs from all over the world and admire their courage and persistence
lender.occupational_info: I design, build and monetize great consumer internet experiences

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I think we need to unite humanity and help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide housing to those who wouldn't be able to afford it otherwise.

lender.name: Ty1720
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to need money to succeed in a business and have been poor before.
lender.occupational_info: I cut grass, trim bushes, trees and install new plants for homes and businesses.

lender.name: Beatrice
lender.loan_because: ..it's the right thing to do and it's a working solution in action.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a small biotech company developing tests to detect nasty bacteria

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I understand how hard it is to raise money to finace your own business and to just get started.
lender.occupational_info: I design apron patterns. I purchase fabric and cut out the designs and sew the aprons on a machine. I sell the finished aprons on the internet.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: software user interface design.

lender.name: Tomasz
lender.loan_because: I believe that stimulating entrepreneurship is the right way to help developing countries. Oh - and it feels nice :)
lender.occupational_info: I study computer science, I tried a couple of my own bussinesses, I\'m a member of AIESEC.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I appreciate having a face on the person to whom I am lending and knowing about their circumstances, hopes and aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: I was a lawyer in private practice with an interest in civil rights law and, later, a lawyer and administrative law judge for the United States Department of Labor

lender.name: grayson
lender.loan_because: Helping those in need is our highest moral mission and obligation.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I've been given more opportunities than most.
lender.occupational_info: Software developer.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People helping people change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Selling reusable products to adults who wear diapers.

lender.name: Pedro Gonzalez
lender.loan_because: I wish the best to people who dare to start something new. [Deseo lo mejor a las personas que se atreven a empezar algo nuevo]
lender.occupational_info: I test solar modules so they are safer and have higher energy yields. [Yo hago experimentos con paneles solares para que sean mas seguros y produzcan mas energia]

lender.name: Haden Smith
lender.loan_because: The micro lending concept makes sense to me and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it means something to me to be able to give someone a chance to take control of her life.

lender.name: Annu
lender.loan_because: With so much economic disparity and political conflict in the world, I believe that those of us who are more fortunate have an obligation to assist, in whatever way possible, those in need. Also, it's exciting to participate in an innovative approach toward philanthropy. Not least of all, it's very rewarding to reach out to someone across the globe and know that you can make a direct difference in improving their lives.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: A little help can make a big difference. People helped me pay for my education. Now, it is my turn to help others.
lender.occupational_info: je suis prof. soy profesora. I teach children who are 15 and 16 years old. I teach the history of the world. I teach boys and girls. I teach 5 classes in one day. Each class is 55 minutes. Each class has about 30-40 students. I do not teach on Saturdays and Sundays. I do not teach in the summer. I am paid by the local government. My salary is average for an American.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help people with whom I would otherwise never come into contact. Also I believe the best way to help is to allow people to help themselves. If microlending can make someone self-sufficient, that is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer systems for a large company in the education sector.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps people create better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I raise cattle and write a column for my local newspaper every two weeks.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: gotta help
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer.

lender.name: annette
lender.loan_because: i am able
lender.occupational_info: I am an office assistant

lender.name: Josh and Megan
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ calls us to not only look forward to heaven as a future hope, but to also bring heaven to earth as a present reality. If we can contribute to bettering someone's life by giving a small donation, we are joining in the mission to reconcile this world to its Creator and aiding in that process of bringing that heavenly Hope into the "here and now".
lender.occupational_info: Megan is a physician and Josh is a youth pastor.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a small farm where we grow vegetables, raise chickens for eggs and meat and tend a couple hives of bees.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in microfinance
lender.occupational_info: I'm a grad student in Environmental Engineering and Public Policy with an interest in sustainability and developing countries issues

lender.name: Kali
lender.loan_because: It's a convenient way to give back to those in need around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a tech

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: we must work to make the world a place we are proud of: a world without poverty, a world full of hope and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Film and Television

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: it\'s the very least I can do in a world that has been generous to me and less fortunate for others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer software that teaches children and adults how to read. My company also provides training to teachers to improve literacy.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I feel that God has called me to lend people money who need it. I am not rich, but I want to help when I can. God bless and WORK HARD and you will earn the money you need! I hope my loan helps.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach English to children.

lender.name: M. MEL
lender.loan_because: It is a small way of doing "the right thing" and the right lesson to teach our children.

lender.name: Sheila & Terry
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets you help hard-working people in developing countries to whom small amounts of money mean a lot. Every time a loan is paid off, you get the gift of being able to re-lend to someone else. (In the photo we are at the Three Rivers Dam on the Yangtze River, in China.)
lender.occupational_info: Terry helps run an organization for people who work at colleges and universities and who are planning for the future of higher (tertiary) education. Sheila is a health and wellness professional.

lender.name: Thelma
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way of helping others support themselves and contribute to their families and communities. It also feels good to be part of the global family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a United Methodist clergy person.

lender.name: BoulderOne
lender.loan_because: We represents a group of friends from Boulder, Colorado, USA.

lender.name: Lee and Kristen
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to know that I am really directly helping someone start their own business. I started my own business 12 years ago and EVERYONE needs help, no matter how hard you work!
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer helping consumers with financial problems. I have been practicing law for 12 years. I have a staff of 8 people and work with my wife Kristen. We have a daughter named Kate who is almost 2 years old.

lender.name: Dory
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women develop their own business and become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and government agencies use computers. I design databases, software applications, and fix problems.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are less fortunate then me.
lender.occupational_info: I started my interior design practice 10 years ago. I feel very fortunate to be working in a profession that I am very passionate about and am able to make a comfortable living at. I am also passionate about helping other people in this world that may not have had the opportunities I have had. I feel a social responsibility to offer as much help as I am capable of to help end poverty and suffering in this world.

lender.name: Stormy
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I help hard working families buy their first home at a price they can afford.

lender.name: Wan Rhedd Katt LOANS
lender.loan_because: I'm a capitalist kind of Katt.
lender.occupational_info: Work is for Bees.

lender.name: Patsy
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help those who are in need.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: It\'s the best investment possible.

lender.name: Jerry Bires
lender.loan_because: I want to help others trying to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: The company for which I work finds jobs for others.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It\'s important to help others if you can and do your part for our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the development of internet services for a national telecommunications company.

lender.name: Serena
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who weren't lucky enough to be born where I was born.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: jill
lender.occupational_info: I teach people who didn't finish high school and now want to get theri diplomas

lender.name: Ed P
lender.loan_because: I believe in the KIVA concept.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of micro credit and the importance of helping small businesses and hardworking people the world over.
lender.occupational_info: I produce television programs for the international marketplace. My company shoots and sells its series and specials on 6 continents.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I like enabling others to help themselves, and I enjoy the idea of having every dollar I contribute help multiple entrepreneurs over time.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Link
lender.loan_because: \"To one who has been given much, much is required.\" -Jesus (Luke 12:48)
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of researchers who want to find ways of helping children with spina bifida and their families.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to do something worthwhile with my money, because the people on here have amazing stories and because I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in England, currently studying English at degree level.

lender.name: Villalagunaphuket.com
lender.loan_because: Satisfaction in helping people help themselves & because we are in a position to.
lender.occupational_info: Holiday Home in Phuket Thailand

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We're are all in this togeather.

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. I contribute with this in mind.
lender.occupational_info: Helping families realize and maintain affordable housing.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: well i'm a little too short on cash at the moment going through school but microfinance is changing and bettering thousands of lives and when i finally get off my ass and get a job i'll be able to help in a small way.

lender.name: Lizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their goals!
lender.occupational_info: I write write about the different ways to invest money.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: It's a start.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study interactions among plants, soil, and soil organisms to better understand how ecosystems work.

lender.name: David J. Roof
lender.loan_because: I have complex thoughts about this type of program. The great evil seem to be the legacy of colonization. I'm not sure that capital will resolve these issues, but I find very few meaningful ways to act. I hope this has a positive effect on some peoples lives, but I retain a desire for more significant social transformation.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, research, and write.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a librarian, someone who helps people find information. I also have 4 children who are mostly grown and help with my husband's business.

lender.name: Economicus
lender.loan_because: I hate commies

lender.name: Azita
lender.loan_because: i like to see the small business owners who try succeed.

lender.name: Chris Clark
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help others turn their ideas into reality.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because: empowerment, accountability, and hard work \'lend\' to tacit knowledge of success.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children through adults the fascinations and interelationships of our natural coastal environment.

lender.name: Eric & Nicole
lender.loan_because: We can help... the least, the last, and the lost...help themselves

lender.name: Terrance
lender.loan_because: I believe it's a great program and means so much to global entrepreneurs who may not have other access to loans.

lender.name: treevis
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help someone directly. I\'ve received help from generous people over the years and hope to return the favor to others.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: Ariela
lender.occupational_info: Microfinance

lender.name: Tom & Jess
lender.loan_because: We want to help be a small part of making a difference in peoples lives

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: It feels right
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenage kids, we have a great time and we do some community service together and some community building.

lender.name: Clifford
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves! If my small loan will help others to better their life, and the people they love, then I want to be a part of it!
lender.occupational_info: I work in public health in S.F., CA (USA). As the Sr. Occupational Therapist in my agency, I work primarily with children in the public school system with long-term physical disabilities, e.g., cerebral palsy, etc., to become more independent and productive with their lives.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Kiva addresses many problems the world currently faces.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It\'s fun!

lender.name: Samwell
lender.occupational_info: breathing open systems

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I support small business entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a nonprofit organization in the San Francisco Bay Area called The Bay Citizen. Our mission is to enhance local civic and community news in the Bay Area and stimulate innovation in journalism.

lender.name: Reno
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others. People don\'t need a handout but some investment to start a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur myself. I live in San Francisco adn I am pursuing my dream. I am running bankrupt in the process but I am sure that one day, it will be a success and I will be proud that I did this.

lender.name: Allan & Wendy
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Dom,Erica,Myles&Colby
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for people to start the process of getting out of poverty. They feel accomplished by making their own money, and I am more than glad to be part of the process. Loaning is the easy part, these brave people are doing the real work. Micro-financing is an innovative idea in the fight against poverty. We need more ideas like this one.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I love the life I have and want others to have a happy life too.
lender.occupational_info: I help children grow and feel good about their future.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: Trust that you will all succeed and we will become stronger together.
lender.occupational_info: I have a background in building and construction and have managed a number of small businesses. I also work as a consultant to small start up companies.

lender.name: Wilson Family Fund
lender.loan_because: This portfolio was established in December 2006 for family investments in lieu of Christmas presents.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It would be unthinkable not to. What a powerful way to connect us across the world.

lender.name: Suraiya
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to have a better life and to get the leg up they need to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I make useful and ornamental things out of steel using a forge (source of fire to soften the metal), as well as hammers and other tools for shaping and joining the metal.

lender.name: Robert & Casandra
lender.loan_because: it is a fantastic way to promote economic development through a method which encourages both accountability and entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info:
Robert - I'm an investment analyst. I manage capital for large institutions (insurance companies, pension funds, etc) in a unique area of the financial market.
Casandra - I am an attorney at a law firm and specialize in labor and employment.

lender.name: RainmanzMoney
lender.loan_because: Warren Buffet and Bill Gates shouldn't get all the credit.
lender.occupational_info: Saving the world one borrower at a time.

lender.name: Michael and Elaine
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than sharing what you have. It's also a great way to teach others how easy it is to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Elaine and I run a non-profit preschool together. We feel that good education is for everyone and half of the families at our school are on scholarship. We cater to many different children from different backgrounds. We have taught children from Israel, Syria, Nepal, Korea, China, Czechoslovakia, Italy, Russia, Ethiopia, Laos, Vietnam, Armenia, Taiwan, Guatemala, Argentina and Japan, many of whom came to us with little or no English.

lender.name: JoAnna & Mike
lender.loan_because: These loans are a gift in the name of JoAnna and Mike -- two generous people who work hard to help others make a better stake in the world for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: JoAnna is a Linguistics and English professor at a university in California and Mike is a business man who helps companies merge and grow.

lender.name: Vladek
lender.occupational_info: Technology Project Manager

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I admire people who strive to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own our own awards business.

lender.name: harvey Bobs
lender.loan_because: cause I want to tackle poverty likea spydar monkey.
lender.occupational_info: pretty boring. I eat doughnuts on my break. I build go-machines.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people I would never otherwise connect with. Everyone deserves a chance to create their destiny!
lender.occupational_info: I work to help protect and restore the environment and economy of the Great Lakes region.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I believe providing capital to enterprising people with good ideas can help improve the lives of those people and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Before retiring, I worked as a computer engineer who looked for errors in the design of chips that are used to build personal computers.

lender.name: Michael A.
lender.loan_because: I wish to help those who are working to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build tools used in my work place that cut and shape metal parts and mold plastic parts used in the manufacture of my company's finished product, orthopedic braces.

lender.name: European Textile Collection
lender.loan_because: This holiday season we wanted to share part of our profits to help those dedicated to our industry around the world.

lender.name: Kitty and Jim
lender.loan_because: God is not going to ask us how much money we made, but He will probably ask how we used His blessings to bless others. We like making a difference around the world, glad someone thought of a concept like Kiva. It has blessed us to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: Kitty has the best jobs in the world: Teaching children to be independent and helping people get healthier.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I can help change the world, even if it is in a small way.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Everywhere I travel I meet wonderful people who are struggling to make a living. I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Irvington High School
lender.loan_because: My students study the effects of the industrial revolution and globalization, we decided to give back.
lender.occupational_info: High School Students (Ages 15-18)

lender.name: Marya
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an experiential educator both in the typical classroom and in the classroom of the wilderness.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: It\'s a great way to give people help growing their businesses. I\'ve had lots of help here in the US over the years and it\'s great to be able to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I work with non-profit companies helping them get the word out about what they are doing by using the web and things like blogs and podcasts so that other people will learn about and support their work.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ingenuity of small business owners, and the positive impact a successful business has on a community.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I have so much money that I spend on useless things that don\'t matter, and what I have can make a huge difference in other people\'s lives.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us needs to make a difference where we can. Like the little boy throwing starfish back into the see, I do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I develop databases to make life easier for those who use them.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by the hard work of the loan applicants.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper, where I write stories about education.

lender.name: Micheles Granola
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to sustainable change through my life and my business by helping women all over the world improve their lives through self-employment.
lender.occupational_info: I am a food entreprenuer and aspiring social enterpriser! I started a small business selling my handmade granola at a farmers market and now feed hungry granola lovers in six states through partnerships with over 100 natural food retailers including Whole Foods Market.

lender.name: DJ KaatSkratch
lender.loan_because: I wish to help fight poverty and suffering and assist people in becoming self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I play music to make people dance and smile.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's a great, direct way to help people. I can give a small amount and watch it change someone's quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I do research in mental health, specifically looking at sleep disorders.

lender.name: P.E.A.C.E Club
lender.loan_because: We believe that teenagers are the world\'s greatest resource, and we want to give back a little bit of what we have been given.
lender.occupational_info: We are students at a high school outside of Chicago, USA. We work very hard to get good grades and go to college.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Who doesn't want to be a world financier?
lender.occupational_info: I spend each day realizing just how little I know.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I am excited at the prospect of helping people make positive changes in their lives; I respect people who work hard and I think hard work should be rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer networks in law offices; I train legal workers to use case management software.

lender.name: Heather McDonald
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneur spirit and ambition. I know how rewarding it can be to succeed by standing on your own two feet. With success comes confidence and inner power.
lender.occupational_info: I primarily work with home technology integration sales for high-rise towers & residential homes. The integrated technology includes lighting control, Distributed Music, Automated Shades, Surround Sound Cinemas etc. which enables the home owner to control their living environment with the touch of a button.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It is the small things that give me pleasure.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel that as a citizen of the United States I have many more opportunities to enjoy a comfortable life and it is my duty to share what I have with others who can use it to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to teach.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe we are our brothers' and sisters' keepers.
lender.occupational_info: I study medieval and Renaissance art, and am passionate about research and teaching.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I feel it is very appropriate for people who do have income to give as much of it as they can away. The world does have scarce resources, but by sharing generously there is enough for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make computers work for the needs of faculty, staff, researchers and students at the University of California, Irvine.

lender.name: Jennifer Casey
lender.loan_because: My conscience demands it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Infopreneur. I build and maintain websites like WeeksMotorcycle.com, CruiserCompanions.com, PoconoGardening.com and WhatIsTheMatterWithPeople.com.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I admire and want to support those people who are working hard to make a difference in their lives, their businesses, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a printing company in Seattle, Washington (USA). I am the technology manager. I take care of all the computers at my company. I also volunteer at night as an English teacher for refugees who have come to the United States from around the world.\r\n

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I know my money is going directly to the people who need it, and will use it to improve their lives. They look at the loan as a gesture of friendship, not a hand out.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Nigeria and I know the difference that a little help can make in peoples lives. I want to give back to people not as fortunate as I have been in life.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial photography/illustration

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: Poverty is stupid

lender.name: thedr9wningman
lender.loan_because: It is a good investment and it is better to have a local economy make profits locally than to have a corporation take the benefits away from the local area. Sustainability is what I do.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that utilities are not lying about the things they do. I measure energy savings and write reports to verify energy savings to oversight committees.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I help those I can...

lender.name: Prayers Place
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good, while helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies get traffic to their websites on the Internet.

lender.name: Errol and Heidi
lender.loan_because: we want to help others provide for their families and achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Anne Marie
lender.loan_because: My grandparents were immigrants to America, and they came here because of the opportunities available, if you are willing to work. Life was better for my parents. They were honest hard working people with six children, and we learned how to live our lives by their good examples. Parents are the same all over the world. They want to provide for the families they love, and give them the opportunity of a better life. I want to help give someone the chance to achieve this.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee and direct the administrative and financial issues of a small research department of a major university.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because it is direct and I know where my donation is going.
lender.occupational_info: I make functional pottery by hand on a potters wheel. I make several pots from which I donate to designated non-profits. I like to see the connections between me, my customers and others.

lender.name: Amy & Eric
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Amy works at a non-profit after-school arts center for children. Eric is an illustrator who works to design green buildings.

lender.name: Kelly and her students
lender.loan_because: I wanted my high school students to participate in an incredible service learning project. Kiva provided that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school Economics teacher at a private school in Hawaii. I have international students as well as students from Hawaii. We learn about many of the things that Kiva represents - entrepreneurship, trade, and banking, to name a few. My students have raised funds to help others and I\'m really proud of their commitment to be a part of Kiva!

lender.name: Heathen Harvest
lender.loan_because: I care about other people having the oppurtunity to prosper. I want to share the oppurtunity that I have been gifted with others looking to better themselves and thier families.
lender.occupational_info: I am physically disabled and unable to work though I own a non-profit music magazine that focuses on underground music from around the world. Twelve other volunteers contribute and help me run the magazine.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. - Mark Twain

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have a little more than I need.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I wish to contribute to the global effort to help the poor of our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician specialized in Psychiatry. I am originally from Colombia and more than 60% of my patients are Hispanic immigrants in a large metropolitan area in the USA. The loans I made have been with funds I have set aside for Holidays presents at the hospital where I work. All my gift recipients receive a card from me explaining how I chose to spend the money in lieu of conventional presents. In general everybody has been very happy with my decision.

lender.name: Micah & Kristy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with being born in a middle-class family and having lived in Senegal when younger, I know how a few dollars can go a long ways in the hands of the inventive and resourceful Senegalese and Africans in general.

lender.name: Soul Aligned
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and wish to provide as much as I can to support other fledgling business owners worldwide.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I enjoy providing an opportunity to those who have a vision, the drive and wish to improve their economic well being and the lives around them.
lender.occupational_info: We invest capital in unique businesses in the US and create value for employees and shareholders.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: As a business lawyer, I want to be able to help those fulfill and realize his/her dream of owing his/her own business.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a business lawyer who advises and helps privately held, entrepreneurial companies in everything from negotiating contracts to helping them raise money.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: Ask yourself this: What if the shoe were on the other foot?
lender.occupational_info: God first. Others second.

lender.name: theresa
lender.loan_because: I saw a television program about Kiva and thought it was a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lender.name: Evolutionary IT
lender.loan_because: Traditional lending institutions often overlook many in the world leaving them on the outskirts of economic systems in which they cannot participate. This access to capital is vital to improving lives, building communities and lessening poverty. No longer do we have to wait for these changes, we can actively be a part of transforming lives and Kiva.org is a strong step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: Evolutionary Information Technology is a leading Information Technology firm that has been providing a wide array of IT services for over 15 years. We implement IT best practice, process and innovative thinking to your business problems. Our real world experience has yielded a deep knowledge of IT infrastructures & their applied best practices. We provide a wide range of services for systems, networks, security, open source, disaster recovery, business continuity, and project management.

lender.name: The Pimiskerns
lender.loan_because: As a family, we would like to contribute to the successes of other people, to be a part of their dreams and aspirations. We have been searching for a way to \'make a difference\' and Kiva is such an amazing concept.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: Someone once loaned me money for my business based on the faith he had in my ability to work hard and it made a lot of difference in my life.

lender.name: Karen, Luis, and Max
lender.loan_because: We want to assist those looking to prove what they can do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others live healthier lives.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I live in the U.S. but travel alot for my job and I see how difficult it can be in other parts of the world to make a living. I am happy to be able to make a small difference!
lender.occupational_info: I take travelers to Asia (mostly the Himalayan countries) on special interest tours and treks.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in potential.

lender.name: Sen
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to do some good during my brief time here.

lender.name: staphnie
lender.occupational_info: i protect wetlands and streams so that people will have clean water

lender.name: James and Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ben & Abbi
lender.loan_because: we can directly help improve the lives of hardworking people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a sign company. I also have entrepreneurial businesses on the side.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's satisfying to be personally involved in micro-development - and Kiva means we on this planet are ALL neighbors!
lender.occupational_info: I like to connect people and ideas ...technologically and spiritually. I am an attention-deficit integrator.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way of giving people a helping hand.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps

lender.name: Zaki & Shelly
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so that we can bless others.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I believe those of us who have more have a responsibility to help others who need assistance. Pass it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can in memory of my mom who spent her life in service to her family and to others.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Financially sustainable method for increasing economic activity in developing regions.
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student in department of Biological Engineering at MIT

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: I feel privileged to have the life I have, and I want to help other people improve their lives whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school children at a public Montessori school.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: When you are fortunate to have adequate resources you must give to those that do not. If each of us reaches out to “the other”, we will find common ground. As an entrepreneur, I very much appreciate the drive exhibited by these individuals. Kiva is wonderful conduit that allows me to reach those I would have never known about in a one-to-one experience.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a taxi driver, door-to-door book salesmen, a photographer, clothing salesmen, a software developer. My work life has been like a billiard ball that goes one way than another. I bounce from one thing to the next. It all seems to work out.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others out around the world get a chance to do well in business. If there is a little somthing I can do to help get people started, why not?
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Peace Corps, so my experience there has opened my eyes to the impact even small things can have on people around the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: a little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I design mechanical systems for commercial and industrial clients helping them effectively spend there money.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves

lender.name: Pakalulu
lender.loan_because: Help others, giving back, make a difference, improve the world. I believe a more prosperous world is good for all of us in the long run. And this is probably the best way to help that I know of.
lender.occupational_info: I help in making newer and better computers and electronics.

lender.name: LSAstaff
lender.loan_because: LSA staff decided to honor one another and, in lieu of exchanging Christmas gifts, fund Kiva microloans.
lender.occupational_info: Lutheran Services in America is a network of nearly 300 independent Lutheran health and human services organizations across America and in the Caribbean. This KIVA project is a cooperative effort undertaken by the LSA office staff.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: To teach my children the importance of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help injured people in getting monetary assistance from those who injured them.

lender.name: The Osburns
lender.loan_because: We want to help people that are trying to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their community.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is important to share our wealth with other countries, especially by helping men and women achieve economic independence.
lender.occupational_info: I help performing artists in all apsects of their career, from getting them the work to advising them on career paths.

lender.name: Belladonna
lender.loan_because: I believe in the words of Edward Everett Hale who said: “I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything I will not refuse to do the something I can do.”

lender.name: 1st Lutheran Nebr. City
lender.loan_because: My name is Tim Regler. I was given $100 dollars by my church in a program called "Pay It Forward". All loans on this account were funded through that $100 seed money.
lender.occupational_info: Jesus said "A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another." These loans are given as a token of love and peace in the name of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: I like to help a little, here and there.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I would hope more people who can loan will help those who want to help themselves and their families be more self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of a large Therapy Network. My job is to create opportunities for physical, occupational and speech therapists in private practice.

lender.name: Darin & Janie
lender.loan_because: I run a business. I know how hard it was to get started. If I didn\'t have a little help I probably wouldn\'t have made it.
lender.occupational_info: I create advertising

lender.name: The Rentobalb Family
lender.loan_because: we all shape the world we live in
lender.occupational_info: teaching children / designing buildings

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: it´s a good way to make a tangible difference. Also, I enjoy having ties to other cultures and other lands.

lender.name: Bryan & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: we want to help others get a start

lender.name: xavier
lender.loan_because: I have faith in the goodness of world and free markets as the change agent that will bring mankind out from under his rock and into the bright new world of ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers, specifically the Internet to help medium and large businesses find more customers.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a fair and equal chance at a happy and healthy life.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Robert, I'm a student/activist.

lender.name: Cara Valentino
lender.loan_because: I believe every person deserves a chance to thrive.

lender.name: Ronny
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel great to have helped people get a business going and improve their lives. So little can make such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I transform plain painted walls!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself who has some great advantages here in the US. I want people around the world to be able to provide for themselves and their family, be safe, healthy and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I have always wanted to make the world a better place through my work. For over 25 years I have worked in the environmental field. Now I help people find investors or loans for their business ventures.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I don't have alot, but I have enough to help out a little here and there. I like to see that a few dollars of mine combined with a few dollars from other people can make a difference in one person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day. I look at insurance contracts, and change the wording where necessary. It's a lot of reading, which is just what I like!

lender.name: Poker4Pam
lender.loan_because: We are a group of people that get together from time to time to play some friendly poker. Several years back one of our coworkers, Pam Handrich, passed away from cancer. We were looking for a way to carry on her memory and started raising funds. After a few months we had about $250 saved up and didn't know what to do with it. One of the members of the group suggested we donate it to Kiva and the rest is history. We now donate money at each one of our get-togethers, with the goal being to raise at least $25 to take out a new loan. As these are loans and not gifts, her memory will live on with each loan repayment as we provide another loan.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who want to work hard to provide better lives for themselves and their families. Those people deserve the opportunity to shape their lives.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: It's about bringing light to this world which has so much darkness. I think of the entrepreneurs at Kiva as having small flames of light; the lending that I do provides fuel for that light so that it can grow and illuminate our world.

lender.name: Jonathan and Leslie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Remember the Golden Rule.

lender.name: RICH CHICKS
lender.loan_because: We believe we all have the human right to pursue prosperity. Just opening a small door of support we help pave a path to a more equal and just society. Let’s face it –it is totally fun to watch people succeed. How many people can say that being a global financier is their hobby?
lender.occupational_info: We teach women about money. As a financial education company in the United Stateswe guide women and teens as they transition into a prosperous life.

lender.name: Duskin
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born into a society where financial freedom is possible through creative intelligence and abundant opportunity. I am thankful for this gift and would like to extend the possibility to others.

lender.name: Jo R and Dean Fisher
lender.loan_because: We're trying to help out other individuals who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Our artwork is based on our observations of all aspects of the natural world. But invite individual interpretations of our artwork over our description of it.

lender.name: Kirstie
lender.loan_because: The Olde Pigg steered me here, and why not? Visit him at http://oldwalrus.schraf.com.
lender.occupational_info: Student of ethnomusicology.

lender.name: Rose & Wayne
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need and we feel a responsibility to do so.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I believe the power of money, ambition, and hard work will make the world a better place.

lender.name: Cousin Syndicate
lender.loan_because: an old song says - one man gathers what another man spills...
lender.occupational_info: we are cousins in an American family hoping to plant a seed, watch it grow..

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a impact in this world and sharing my resources in the U.S. is a way for me to make a impact. I don't have much but what i do have can be used to help empower others who have much less than i do.
lender.occupational_info: Most of what i do is answer the phone for my business, deposit the money we get and i take care of the logistics of our business.

lender.name: Congregational Church
lender.loan_because:
The Outreach Committee wishes to share it\'s spirit of good work and love with other members of our church family and our community. Through this opportunity to make loans that change lives, we seek to build new relationships and to \"participate\" directly in the process of renewal and reconciliation of varied cultures.

You can join our lending team: http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=community&action=viewTeam&team_id=69
lender.occupational_info: We are a church group, of the United Church of Christ (UCC) affiliation.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have lived on four different continents, I know that people around the world are very similar. We want our lives to be better, and we want some control over our situation. People who are determined and committed need only a little assistance to make big changes in their lives. I have been blessed and fortunate in my country, and I feel that this way I can make a difference to a few peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design parks, football fields, city plazas, and gardens across the United States.

lender.name: Alice Duffy
lender.loan_because: I know it can be hard to start some thing new or keep it going.

lender.name: Jason & Tricia
lender.loan_because: We saw a television piece about microlending and felt that this was a great way to help others get a new start.
lender.occupational_info: I program and sell POS (point of sale) systems for a company in Toronto called Atlas POS Systems. It involves cash register and computer-based systems. My wife has a degree in film and is currently looking for work in Toronto.

lender.name: liz
lender.loan_because: It\'s great to help others get started on something they want to do. I\'ve pursued similar goals in my life - and have happily succeeded.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to comply with Colorado law when someone has died and it is time to distribute his/her property as the decedent directed. I love this work and the clients I meet!

lender.name: Pomerleau Family
lender.loan_because: We feel so fortunate, and would like to help others live happier and more prosperous lives. We know from personal experience how hard it can be to start a small business. We like the idea of helping people around the world help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: See link below for pin map of some of our Kiva loans:

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an infant who is moving quickly into the world of toddlers - basically, I'm one going on three.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I believe that positive change in our world happens through individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on a Master's Degree in Public History.

lender.name: Hameda
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jesse & James
lender.loan_because: We believe that the best way to combat poverty around the world is to help entrepreneurs like the ones we are helping to get on their feet and start creating markets, one neighborhood at a time.
lender.occupational_info: One of us is an attorney, and the other works in real estate.

lender.name: Gord
lender.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am compared to others in this world. This is a chance to make a real difference in other people\'s live at a very small cost to me.

lender.name: des
lender.loan_because: I admire enterprise
lender.occupational_info: I'm an assistant professor of philosophy

lender.name: A.E.C.
lender.loan_because: it is a good idea and a proactive gift.

lender.name: janet
lender.loan_because: i found this page thru matt.org.i\'ve initially loaned as a christmas gift for my father-in-law from juan jose ríos, sinaloa... i\'ll be presenting this gift to him at christmas,\'06. i\'ll loan again from myself.
lender.occupational_info: i work at home - what most women of the world do - childcare, cook, clean, etc...\r\n\r\ni love reading as well... during the nursing sessions.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I support hard working and honest people who want to make a positive change.

lender.name: Saralyn
lender.loan_because: my cousin gave me this awesome present for our wedding.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: If I am able, I should. It is very rewarding and it works!
lender.occupational_info: I work teaching beekeeping skills to young people in a town in Morocco. Also, music lessons, English and French lessons.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It is nice to help others.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It does good and comes back to me.\r\nWho could ask for more?
lender.occupational_info: Never done :^).

lender.name: Hans-Günter
lender.loan_because: ...I can. This is a lot better than giving to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for a German airline and was stationed in Turkey, Syria, Poland, Australia and the USA for almost 30 years, am back now in my native Germany but still enjoy travelling a lot.

lender.name: Ronald J
lender.loan_because: This is the most efficient way to make good use of surplus money, even in small amounts, that I have found. The people on the other end of these transactions will change the world. Bet on it; I do.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and helping someone establish or build their businesses makes me feel like I might be making a difference somewhere.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: We can help so much with so small a contribution.
lender.occupational_info: I advise oil companies on how to prevent pipeline failures.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together and helping one person inevitably helps another, and so on and so on; and that is just perfect!

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I think it's everyone's responsibility to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: The gap between the rich and poor countries is growing. We cannot depend on our government to assist those in need in poor countries. The loans they give through the World Bank and IMF often are given as a means of gaining leverage to force poorer governments to provide rich countries with resources (oil, etc.). With Kiva, I can make a difference that has a trickle down effect on the micro-economy of a particular region. What\'s more, I'm not providing charity. I am giving people the tools to succeed and helping them to take control of their own futures.
lender.occupational_info: My company buys advertising space on many different websites. We aggregate that inventory and sell it to advertisers with the promise of optimizing their ads to the websites that will provide them with the greatest return.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The need is there and I am here to help.
lender.occupational_info: I repair medical equipment. I fix all the things that doctors and nurses break.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe we can change the world.

lender.name: Ashley & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: We are all part of one world. When we thrive or suffer, we affect one another. It's important that we support one another in our dreams and share our resources to make our world a better place.
lender.occupational_info:
Ashley - Leader, Collaborative Strategies at Barrett Values Centre. We measure values in businesses and nations to support human potential.
Jonathan - Associate Director of Development at American Conservatory Theater.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I make things look pretty.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It's a small planet.
lender.occupational_info: I design furniture and interior construction for people\'s homes, including installation of new kitchens and bathrooms. I also paint, and love art.

lender.name: Jo-Elle
lender.loan_because: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. - Aesop

lender.name: Class 07-08 Salinas High
lender.occupation: Students and teacher at Salinas High

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: On the Tzedakah scale this way of providing assistance is top shelf.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to repair the world one step at a time.

lender.name: AccountAbility
lender.loan_because: Our first loans were placed in honor of our clients, instead of gifts at Christmas. As we have added loans, we are excited to participate in helping small businesses make a difference in lives around the world. We firmly believe that micro-lending is a way to give a hand up for those in poverty or on the brink of poverty, while allowing them to maintain their dignity in the process. And for us, it both broadens our horizons and helps us have a greater understanding of the world we live in--to have a global perspective.
lender.occupational_info: By helping small businesses account for what they do with their business finances, we assist them in making good business decisions based on good information. Together we work to make their enterprise successful.

lender.name: Econ 350
lender.occupation: Money and banking class at Binghamton University
lender.loan_because: I want my students to learn about the power of micro-lending in alleviating poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I try to teach socially responsible economics

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: we like to share some of our good fortune

lender.name: Jon & 1 Thing Ministries
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us. We want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers and their families about the love of Jesus and what it means to be His disciple. My group does what it can to be Christ to a hurting community.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it is a way to enable people with limited financial resources to secure entrepreneurial loans and change their lives

lender.name: Ryan Hudson
lender.loan_because: I see Kiva as the best use of the Internet since, well, EVER. Giving the average person the ability to empower an entrepreneur on another continent via a lending model rather than donation or charity is about as exciting and powerful an idea as I can imagine.
lender.occupational_info: I can't, it would require elaborate hand gestures.

lender.name: Paul & Teri
lender.loan_because: We appreciate the hard work people do to make a living. We appreciate all the people who make the effort to acquire a loan through KIVA which we are sure that this alone is quite an undertaking. We are the world.
lender.occupational_info: We make maps!

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Just to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage several different material and process related programs in our aircraft manufacturing firm.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I love that individuals like me have the opportunity to lend money directly to people in need half way around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise the accounts and activities of investment accounts for a financial services company.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I feel like this is an opportunity to make a difference in others lives. This, in turn, makes a huge impact on my own.

lender.name: Ross Strategy
lender.loan_because: We are concerned about our responsibilities in this world and wish to use our collective resources to make a positive change.
lender.occupational_info: We are a class of business students at the Ross School of Business (University of Michigan) who took a course on the corporation in society.

lender.name: Christiane
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 4 young children and I run a sheep farm. We sell both the wool from our sheep as well as meat and breeding stock.

lender.name: Oppy
lender.loan_because:
every responsible person should have access to credit.

"Never doubt that a small group of citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." - Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: I help big non-profit institutions (Foundations, Colleges, etc.) invest their money.
